title: Infiltrator Irelia
body: Will Infiltrator {{champion:39}} ever come back in a bundle or coming back to the store?

replies.body:
Infiltrator Irelia is a Legacy Skin and not a Limited Edition skin, which means that it'll likely return back to the store at sometime in the future (perhaps when the Legacy Vault opens again!). 

http://kb.leaguevolunteers.com/general:skins_list
